bullets: Build and maintain the KMT healthcare platform with React, Next.js, Express, and MongoDB across multiple clinics.
Create multilingual, themeable dashboards plus responsive layouts for clinicians, support, QA, and hardware teams.
Develop ECG visualization modules that stream BLE/WebSocket data and surface AI insights in real time.
Own device inventory, allocation, and analytics views while collaborating with backend + QA pods for releases.
Learned modern React patterns, Git collaboration, and API integration through production prototypes.
Converted Figma designs into responsive components and honed component/state architecture skills.
Partnered with mentors to adopt CI-friendly coding standards and cross-browser testing habits.
